# UITableViewDropProposal.Intent.automatic

**Case**

Incorporate the content in an appropriate way based on the drop location.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UITableViewDropProposal.Intent.unspecified**: No drop proposal was specified.
- **UITableViewDropProposal.Intent.insertAtDestinationIndexPath**: Insert the dropped content at the specified index path.
- **UITableViewDropProposal.Intent.insertIntoDestinationIndexPath**: Incorporate the dropped content into the row at the specified index path.

items.description: Insert the dropped content at the specified index path.

items.description: Incorporate the dropped content into the row at the specified index path.
